UAE National with family book About the teamThe role will report to the Business Sector Manager and you will be working in a busy warehouse environment wherein you will be dealing directly with the Supervisor on a daily basis What equips you for the roleThe ideal candidate for this role should possess at least a school diploma. You should also be able to communicate effectively with strong customer service, analytical and communication skills. Job Details
